description: Creative+Technical Benchmark - Tests free tier LLMs on tasks requiring both coding skills and creative constraints

prompts.prompt: Create a Python budget tracker that: 1) Tracks income and expenses with categories, 2) Calculates monthly totals, 3) Outputs a monthly summary AS A HAIKU poem (5-7-5 syllables). Include complete working code.

code_works.description: Code runs without errors and performs the basic budget tracking

meets_requirements.description: Implements all three requirements (tracking, categories, haiku output)

creative_output.description: Haiku is valid (5-7-5) and meaningfully reflects the budget data

prompts.prompt: Write a JavaScript function that generates a short story about recursion, where the story itself is told using recursive function calls. The story should have at least 3 levels of recursion and make sense as a narrative.

code_works.description: Code runs and demonstrates proper recursion

meets_requirements.description: Has 3+ recursion levels and tells a coherent story

creative_output.description: Story is engaging and the recursion metaphor is clever

prompts.prompt: Create a Python program that validates whether a given text is a valid limerick using only regular expressions. Include test cases with valid and invalid limericks. The regex should check the AABBA rhyme scheme pattern.

code_works.description: Code runs and regex patterns are syntactically valid

meets_requirements.description: Validates rhyme scheme and includes test cases

creative_output.description: Approach to rhyme detection is clever and the test limericks are amusing

prompts.prompt: Create a Python function that takes weather data (temperature, conditions, humidity) and generates an ASCII art representation of the weather. Include at least 5 different weather conditions (sunny, cloudy, rainy, snowy, stormy) with distinct ASCII art for each.

code_works.description: Code runs and generates ASCII output

meets_requirements.description: Handles 5+ weather conditions with distinct art

creative_output.description: ASCII art is recognizable and aesthetically pleasing

prompts.prompt: Write a Python class that analyzes a dataset (list of numbers) and generates a Shakespearean sonnet (14 lines, iambic pentameter, ABAB CDCD EFEF GG rhyme scheme) where each quatrain describes a different statistical property (mean, median, standard deviation, outliers).

code_works.description: Code runs and calculates statistics correctly

meets_requirements.description: Generates 14-line poem covering all four statistical properties

creative_output.description: Poem follows sonnet structure and statistics are woven in creatively

evaluation_notes.code_execution: Run code in sandboxed environment, check for errors
evaluation_notes.creative_scoring: Use LLM-as-judge with rubric for creative elements
evaluation_notes.partial_credit: Award partial credit for partially working solutions
